variants.label: Long-form Article · Deep Dive
variants.description: Suitable for 1,500–3,000-word structured long-form pieces, such as newsletter columns, deep dives, and brand long-form articles.

variants.label: Standard Article · Regular Update
variants.description: Suitable for 800–1,500-word blog or newsletter updates, balancing readability and information density.

variants.label: Explainer / How-to Guide
variants.description: Explainers, product tutorials, and how-to guides for non-expert readers, with clear structure and solid examples.

variants.label: Weekly Work Report
variants.description: Generate a structured weekly report based on this week’s work items, highlighting outcomes, issues, and next week’s plan.

variants.label: Work Summary / Project Retrospective
variants.description: Monthly/quarterly/end-of-project summaries and retrospectives, emphasizing outcomes, learnings, and reflections.

variants.label: Business Update Deck Notes
variants.description: Organize complex business context into a structured write-up for PPTs and meetings.

variants.label: Brief Summary
variants.description: 将长文压缩为 3–5 段Brief Summary，保留主要信息与结论。

variants.label: Structured Bullet Notes
variants.description: Produce hierarchical bullet points for reading notes or meeting minutes.

variants.label: Ad Copy for Performance Marketing
variants.description: Generate multiple high-converting short copies for feed/search ad placements.

variants.label: Landing Page Hero Copy
variants.description: Create homepage banner copy and key selling-point section copy for products/campaigns.

variants.label: Short Social Posts
variants.description: Short-form content and titles suitable for social platforms.

variants.label: Sales Conversation Practice
variants.description: Generate multi-turn sales dialogue scripts and objection-handling examples.

variants.label: Customer Support / Service Dialogue
variants.description: Service-oriented dialogue scripts for support, after-sales, and operations scenarios.

variants.label: Long Story
variants.description: 根据主题生成有起承转合的Long Story文本或演讲故事线。

variants.label: Short Story / Anecdote
variants.description: Short stories and narrative examples for social media or icebreakers.

variants.label: Style Transfer Rewrite
variants.description: Rewrite while preserving meaning, transferring to a specified tone or brand voice.

variants.label: Plain-language Explanation
variants.description: Rewrite technical/obscure content into clear, easy-to-understand explanations.

variants.label: Formalize into Written Form
variants.description: Rewrite casual language into formal, standard written style.

variants.label: Smart Polishing
variants.description: Improve wording, fix grammar, and make expressions more natural for existing text.

variants.label: Polish + Quality Scoring
variants.description: Polish first, then score by dimensions and provide improvement suggestions—ideal for important drafts.

variants.label: Business Analysis Report
variants.description: Combine data and context to produce a structured business analysis and recommendations.

variants.label: Option / Scenario Comparison
variants.description: Compare multiple alternatives by pros/cons and applicable scenarios.

variants.label: Single Paper Deep Read
variants.description: Produce an academic-style summary and key-point analysis for a single paper.

variants.label: Multi-paper Literature Review
variants.description: Create a structured literature review and research thread based on multiple papers.

variants.label: Table Data Interpretation
variants.description: Parse table fields and structure to output key metrics and trend insights.

variants.label: Metric Definition & Methodology
variants.description: Explain metric definitions, calculation methods, and interpretation caveats.

variants.label: Market Insights One-pager
variants.description: 生成一页纸Market Insights One-pager，涵盖现状、趋势与机会。

variants.label: Competitive Landscape Comparison
variants.description: Compare multiple competitors across features, pricing, and strategy.

variants.label: Interview Outline / Script
variants.description: Generate a structured interview outline and question list based on topic and interviewee.

variants.label: Interview Minutes
variants.description: Turn interview notes into minutes and bullet points, highlighting conclusions and action items.

variants.label: Email Drafting
variants.description: Generate well-structured, properly toned email drafts in Chinese and English.

variants.label: Email Review & Edits
variants.description: Rewrite and improve the user’s draft email and provide brief suggestions.

variants.label: Bilingual (CN/EN) Email
variants.description: Generate bilingual business emails with aligned information in both languages.

variants.label: Pitch Script
variants.description: Generate a story-driven pitch script and speaking structure for live presentations.

variants.label: Pitch Deck Structure & Slide Copy
variants.description: Output a standard pitch deck slide structure and key copy points for each slide.

variants.label: Decision Brief
variants.description: Organize background, options, pros/cons, and recommended actions into a decision brief.

variants.label: Option Comparison Matrix
variants.description: Compare options by dimensions and generate a structured matrix explanation.

variants.label: Process Mapping & SOP Design
variants.description: Map process steps from business goals and produce an SOP document.

variants.label: Execution Checklist
variants.description: Convert a process into a checklist of actionable tasks for execution.

variants.label: OKR Design
variants.description: Break down KRs, key tasks, and measurement metrics around a goal.

variants.label: Project Plan
variants.description: Generate a project plan with milestones, task list, and timeline.

variants.label: Business Model Canvas
variants.description: Generate key elements and core logic of a business model canvas based on the project brief.

variants.label: Business Narrative
variants.description: Generate a business narrative based on frameworks like Problem–Solution.

variants.label: Prompt Quality Evaluation
variants.description: Evaluate a single prompt or prompt system and provide improvement suggestions.

variants.label: Task Chain Design
variants.description: Break down complex tasks into multi-step workflows that can map to agent chains.

variants.label: Multi-Agent Task Decomposition
variants.description: Decompose goals into roles, responsibilities, and task chains for multi-agent collaboration.

variants.label: Role Specification
variants.description: Generate role definitions for each agent, including inputs/outputs and boundary constraints.

variants.label: Automation Workflow Blueprint
variants.description: Break business processes into configurable triggers, actions, and conditional steps.

variants.label: System Integration Guide
variants.description: Generate cross-system integration plans and field mappings, including trigger conditions.

variants.label: Quality & Risk Check
variants.description: Score and flag content quality, persona consistency, and potential risk points based on predefined criteria.

variants.label: Compliance Alignment Check
variants.description: Check whether content touches sensitive areas or violates platform/company policies.

variants.label: Docs to FAQ
variants.description: Generate FAQ entries from product docs or knowledge cards.

variants.label: Bot Knowledge Base
variants.description: Build a Q&A knowledge base structure and taxonomy for bots.

variants.label: Document to Slides
variants.description: Generate a slide structure and key points for each slide from long-form text or reports.

variants.label: Slide Outline
variants.description: Output only the slide sections and page outline for designers to fill in later.

variants.label: Table to PRD
variants.description: Convert a feature/requirements table into a structured PRD or product specification.

variants.label: Brief to PRD
variants.description: Generate a standard PRD structure from a natural-language requirements brief.

variants.label: Paper Abstract
variants.description: Generate an academic-style abstract for a single paper.

variants.label: Reading Notes
variants.description: Generate reading notes including research question, methods, conclusions, and limitations.

variants.label: Multi-paper Literature Review
variants.description: 根据多篇文献生成结构化文献综述与研究脉络。

variants.label: Research Design Brief
variants.description: Provide a variable framework and research design suggestions based on the research question.

variants.label: Course Outline
variants.description: Generate a course structure and unit plan based on learning goals and key topics.

variants.label: Lesson Plan
variants.description: Generate learning objectives, lesson flow, and activity design for a single session.

variants.label: Concept & Theory Explainer
variants.description: Provide a systematic definition and structured explanation of a concept or theory.

variants.label: Teaching Q&A
variants.description: Generate typical questions and answers based on core concepts for post-class Q&A.

variants.label: Tech Solution Plan
variants.description: Design a tech stack, component choices, and a lightweight architecture plan based on business requirements.

variants.label: Architecture Overview
variants.description: Generate a written overview of the system architecture for sharing and review.

variants.label: Issue Diagnosis
variants.description: Identify likely causes and an investigation path based on symptoms and logs.

variants.label: Postmortem Report
variants.description: Generate a postmortem report and improvement recommendations for an incident.
